overview: Jimmy Bölja, Töreboda's own celebrity, is happy to share his experiences of what it is like to make an artist career in a small town. How do you treat all fanatical fans, how many shawls can you wear at the same time and how do you get the right image? Jimmy Bölja gives the answers. Filled with bananas and pizza, he prepares for one of his eventful concerts.
title: Jimmy Böljas fantasitrubadurpopskola
